member.name: T:DocFXExample.Example
member.summary: A simple example class with one method which divides two numbers.

member.name: M:DocFXExample.Example.Divide(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Divides the specified dividend by the divisor, returning the quotient and the remainder as a Tuple.
member.param: The dividend - the number which will be divided by the divisor.
The divisor - the number by which the dividend will be divided.
